price: នៅថ្ងៃដែលផែនដី និងភ្នំនឹងរញ្ជួយ ហើយភ្នំនឹងក្លាយទៅ ជាពំនូកខ្សាច់ដែលប៉ើងខ្ចាត់ខ្ចាយ។
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
